strapiPost.title: Newell Development Invests $100m in Bentonville, Adding 500 Residential Units
strapiPost.content:
Newell Development has three multifamily developments in the works in Bentonville, adding 500 residential units to the market within the next two years.

Active Living: Currently under construction, Coler Crossing is a 60-unit walk-up apartment complex at the corner of Walton Blvd and 3rd St., just a mile from the Coler Mountain Bike Preserve. Another development set to break ground by the end of the year is Midcity Commons, consisting of 236 mixed-use units near Northwest Medical Center-Bentonville and amenities like a dog park, gym, coworking space, and a pickleball court.

Need a Lift? Breaking ground in October, Main and A will offer 221 mixed-use units and feature a lounge pool, outdoor courtyards, coworking space, a gym, and six commercial spaces. The site will offer on-site shared car and bike programs and easy access to public transit to encourage alternative transportation.

Learn more about these developments HERE.
